Key Match Events: Maheesh Theekshana picked up three wickets to restrict India to a low total
India tied with Sri Lanka (India win Super Over by 2 wickets)
Pre-Game Insights: Suryakumar Yadav expressed confidence in the team's ability to perform well in the upcoming ODI series
Charith Asalanka mentioned that batting becomes harder as the ball gets older on this pitch
Sri Lanka's skipper Asalanka was concerned about the overs of Pathirana due to his performance
Post-Match Reflections: Sri Lanka's all-round show wins them women's Asia Cup as Harmanpreet & Co stumble in the final
Sri Lanka's batting collapsed for a second successive night as India made full use of it to wrap up the series
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rain delays led to the game being postponed until the next day
Sri Lanka's debutant Wickramasinghe managed to deliver another economical over
The atmosphere is buzzing yet again in the ground with no rain interruptions expected
